summary: "Fast Five" is an action movie from 2011, the fifth in the "Fast & Furious" series. Vin Diesel and Paul Walker star as Dominic Toretto and Brian O'Conner, who team up with Dom's sister Mia to steal $100 million from a corrupt businessman. They're chased by a U.S. agent while trying to pull off the heist. The film has lots of action, including car chases, fights, and gun battles. It was the biggest hit in the franchise at the time, making over $600 million worldwide. The movie moved the series away from street racing and towards more heist-style action, hoping to attract a wider audience.
title: Fast Five
